title: The Case of the Twice Stolen Tiara
description: Beautiful southern-raised TruLeigh Blue-Waters has tired of the New York lifestyle she has grown accustomed to for the past several years. Her love of the south and past friendship with her best friend, Betsy, has her yearning to return to her home town of Willow Valley, Alabama. Accompanied by her daughter Lizzy and brother James, she travels back to the laid-back, less stressful life she once knew in order to finish raising Lizzy in the slow-paced lifestyle she remembered she loved. However, she learns quickly that it isnâ€™t going to be as laid-back as she thought when she is forced to reintroduce her jewel-thievery skills she had so hoped to retire. In this series of books, Tru will be juggling new and old loves all at the same time while trying to keep her former life a secret.
author: S.S. Saunders
